text: Tauriko is a suburb in Tauranga, Bay of Plenty region. It is home to the Tauranga Crossing complex and has State Highway 29 and State Highway 36 passing through the area. There is a primary school in the suburb. Its neighbouring suburbs are Greerton to the east, Pyes Pā to the southeast, Gate Pā to the northeast and Bethlehem to the north. == References == Category:Tauranga
title: Tauriko
